trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Boca Raton
There was one other sighting in Boca Raton on or around January 1st 2011
divs: sighting detailsobserved 8 sphere shaped orange light traveling in a horizantal direction. two traveled together the others approx. 1 to 2 min apart. from the binoculars they appeared as orange lights. no shape to them, definatley not airplanes or any sort of rockets. no vapor trails behind them. no blinking lights what so ever, to fast to be ballons or even helicopters. just wanted to let you know. not sure if it might have been military plasma weapon test but very suspicious. it ocurred at 12:109 am on 01\01\11
